```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

library(tidyverse)
library(sf)
library(raster)
library(kableExtra)
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
library(broom)
library(sp)
library(rworldxtra)
library(gstat)
library(rgdal)
library(ggspatial)

```

```{r}
Diversidad <- read_sf("Diversidad.shp")

Stack <- read_rds("Stack.rds")
```

```{r}
Chile <- getData("GADM", country = "CHL", level = 1) %>% 
  st_as_sf() %>% 
  dplyr::filter(NAME_1 %in% c("Los Ríos", "Los Lagos", "Araucanía")) %>% 
  st_make_valid()

ggplot() + 
  geom_sf(data = Chile) + 
  geom_sf(data = Diversidad, aes(color = DvrsddA)) +
  scale_color_viridis_c(name = "Riqueza de especies") +
  theme_bw()
```

```{r}
plot(Stack)
```

```{r}
Variables_DF = Stack %>% raster::extract(Diversidad) %>% as.data.frame()
Diversidad_2 = bind_cols(Diversidad, Variables_DF)
Diver_2 = Diversidad_2 %>% as_Spatial()

NewVars_DF <-  Stack %>% as("SpatialPixelsDataFrame") %>% as.data.frame() %>% st_as_sf(coords = c(6,7), crs = "+proj=longlat +datum=WGS84 +no_defs") %>%  as_Spatial()
```

```{r}
Z_vgm_null <- variogram(log(DvrsddA) ~ 1 , data = Diver_2) %>% mutate(Modelo = "Diversidad")

Z_vgm_null_1 <- variogram(log(ModificacionHumana) ~ 1 , data = Diver_2) %>% mutate(Modelo = "Modificación Humana")

Z_vgm_null_2 <- variogram(log(TempMedia) ~ 1 , data = Diver_2) %>% mutate(Modelo = "TempMedia")

Z_vgm_null_3 <- variogram(log(RangoTempDiario) ~ 1 , data = Diver_2) %>% mutate(Modelo = "RangoTempDiario")

Z_vgm_null_4 <- variogram(log(PrecAnual) ~ 1 , data = Diver_2) %>% mutate(Modelo = "PrecAnual")

Z_vgm_null_5 <- variogram(log(EstacionalidadPrec) ~ 1 , data = Diver_2) %>% mutate(Modelo = "EstacionalidadPrec")

```

```{r}
#ggplot(Z_vgm_null, aes(x = dist, y = gamma, color = Modelo)) +  geom_path() + geom_point() + theme_bw()

#ggplot(Z_vgm_null_1, aes(x = dist, y = gamma, color = Modelo)) +  geom_path() + geom_point() + theme_bw()

#ggplot(Z_vgm_null_2, aes(x = dist, y = gamma, color = Modelo)) +  geom_path() + geom_point() + theme_bw()

#ggplot(Z_vgm_null_3, aes(x = dist, y = gamma, color = Modelo)) +  geom_path() + geom_point() + theme_bw()

#ggplot(Z_vgm_null_4, aes(x = dist, y = gamma, color = Modelo)) +  geom_path() + geom_point() + theme_bw()

#ggplot(Z_vgm_null_5, aes(x = dist, y = gamma, color = Modelo)) +  geom_path() + geom_point() + theme_bw()

Z_vgm <- rbind(Z_vgm_null, Z_vgm_null_1, Z_vgm_null_2, Z_vgm_null_3, Z_vgm_null_4, Z_vgm_null_5)

ggplot(Z_vgm, aes(x = dist, y = gamma, color = Modelo)) + geom_path() + geom_point() + theme_bw()

```

```{r}
Z_vgm_spatial <- variogram(log(DvrsddA) ~  + coords.x1 + coords.x2 , data = Diver_2) %>% mutate(Modelo = "Espacial")

ggplot(Z_vgm_spatial, aes(x = dist, y = gamma, color = Modelo)) +  geom_path() + geom_point() + theme_bw()

```
